The overall fan interest increases by by a lot!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Andujar Cedeno
Dear Sir,
Andujar Cedeno isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Pittsfield Valley Cats!
He has an AVG of .213, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
